title: Trimagnesium Dicitrate, anhydrous
description:
Trimagnesium Dicitrate, anhydrous (CAS No. 3344-18-1) manufactured by Dr. Paul Lohmann® is a high-purity Magnesium Salt widely used in various industries. As a versatile compound, it is primarily utilized as a Magnesium source in food products, dietary supplements, and pharmaceuticals. Its anhydrous form offers distinct advantages such as low moisture content, making it especially stable and suitable for sensitive formulations. 
 General Characteristics 
 Synonyms: Magnesium Citrate; Magnesium Citrate, tertiary; Magnesium Citrate, tribasic; Magnesium Citrate, anhydrous; neutral Magnesium Citrate 
 Benefits of Trimagnesium Dicitrate, Anhydrous (CAS No. 3344-18-1) 
 Choosing our Trimagnesium Dicitrate, anhydrous ensures a range of benefits tailored to industry needs. This high-quality compound combines exceptional stability with superior performance, making it an excellent choice for diverse applications in pharmaceuticals, nutrition, and food processing. 
 Applications of Tricalcium Citrate, Anhydrous 
 Food Industry 
 Trimagnesium Dicitrate is approved as source of Magnesium for all kind of foods. It is also approved under the E number E345(i) as anti-caking agent and stabilizer in solid food supplements. It is widely used to enrich sports and energy drinks with Magnesium, as well as meal replacements, powder formulations and drink powders. In nutritional supplements, it is found in tablets, capsules, effervescent tablets and dissolving powders. 
 Pharmaceutical Industry 
 Trimagnesium Dicitrate, anhydrous is commonly used as an API or as supplement in the form of tablets or capsules to prevent and treat Magnesium deficiency disorders. Magnesium plays a crucial role in various bodily functions, including muscle and nerve function, bone health, and energy production. The citrate form of Magnesium is known for its relatively high bioavailability, meaning it is better absorbed by the body compared to other Magnesium Salts. 
 Trimagnesium Dicitrate acts as an osmotic laxative by drawing water into the intestine, softening stools, and stimulating natural bowel movements. It’s effective, gentle, and well-tolerated, making it a suitable choice for occasional constipation relief. Moderate dosing is advised to prevent overuse effects like diarrhea. 
 Why Choose Trimagnesium Dicitrate, Anhydrous from Dr. Paul Lohmann? 
 We are a globally recognized manufacturer and supplier of specialty Mineral Salts. We have decades of experience in providing high-quality chemical compounds, and our Tricalcium Citrate, anhydrous is no exception. With exceptional product stability, purity, and a commitment to meeting rigorous international standards, we are the trusted partner for businesses across industries. 
 Further Advantages 
 
 Customizable Specifications: We offer flexibility to meet the unique needs of our clients. 
 Global Supply Chain: Efficient delivery and logistics to ensure timely availability. 
 Expert Support: Our experienced team provides technical support to optimize your formulations.
